Title: Queen's Blade OVA
Description: ["OVAs bundled with the Queen's Blade Premium Visual Book and the Queen's Blade Rebellion Premium Visual Book. Both of the episodes will be based on Queen's Blade Rebellion, a sequel to Queen's Blade: Utsukushiki Toushitachi."]
Related: ["Prequel: Queen's Blade: Utsukushiki Toushi-tachi", "Sequel: Queen's Blade: Rebellion", "Side story: Queen's Blade OVA Specials"]
